name: Re-Fuge
description:
A sci-fi rogue-like where you play as  a refugee escaping from interplanetary conflict. Navigate through solar systems, manage your resources, sneak past military ships and survive against all odds! How to play:

Thrust - W

Turn - A/D

Break - S

Emergency Boost - E

Inventory - I

Mine/Interact/Continue - Left Mouse Button

Stealth - Hold Shift
